Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize the way you manage your daily tasks and streamline your workflow. This product has been meticulously crafted to cater to the unique needs of professionals like yourself, offering unparalleled efficiency and convenience. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $12000. I trust this investment will significantly enhance your productivity and bring substantial value to your work environment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
